query: WITH entities AS (SELECT public_id, id FROM core_credit_facilities WHERE COALESCE(customer_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(collateralization_state = $2, $2 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(status = $3, $3 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE((public_id, id) < ($6, $5), $5 IS NULL)) ORDER BY public_id DESC, id DESC LIMIT $4) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $7 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.public_id desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
